org.qi4j.api.service.importer

Class InstanceImporter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qi4j.api.service.importer.InstanceImporter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceImporter<T>

    public final class InstanceImporter<T>
extends Object
implements ServiceImporter<T>
    Return a predefined service instance that was provided as meta-info. Search for meta-info in the following order: the service itself, the module of the service, the layer of the service, the whole application.
